name: Night is Long
description:
Last October I made a small horror game in 2 weeks for a gamejam using Unity. The theme was " Jump Scares" Theme

I visit the project again and i am happy to release an update that few new things, Polish the game and improve it.

Story Summary

After your car stopped working in the middle of nowhere you find you self into a strange abandoned mansion. Are you able to discover all its secrets?

Control

W A S D : To Walk Around

E : To Interact With Environment (Open Doors , Read Notes , Pick Up Keys etc)
